# BitMart API Documentation

> 134 documentation files | ~103k tokens

## General Documentation

- [About Recvwindow Timestamp](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/about_recvwindow_timestamp.md): About recvWindow, timestamp
- [Api Key Permission Settings](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/api_key_permission_settings.md): API Key Permission Settings
- [Api Library](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/api_library.md): API Type: Futures
- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/authentication.md): - Many APIs require an API Access Key for access. Please refer to
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/change_log.md): - \[Update\] /spot/v2/submit_order New Order(v2) (SIGNED)
- [Data Compression](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/data_compression.md): API Type: Spot
- [Deposit Address Keyed](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/deposit_address_keyed.md): Deposit Address (KEYED)
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/error_codes.md): | HTTP | Description                                                                                                |
- [Faq](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/faq.md): API Type: Futures
- [Format](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/format.md): API Type: Futures
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/network_connectivity.md): Speed limit judgment:
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/rate_limits.md): The speed of the public interface is limited according to the IP, and the speed
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitmart/response_formats.md): The format of the success message returned by the BitMart server to the client.
